mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (user_id, product_name, description, image_path, category_id, auction_start_date, auction_end_date, starting_price, bid_unit, transaction_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productName}, #{description}, #{imagePath}, #{categoryId}, #{auctionStartDate}, #{auctionEndDate}, #{startingPrice}, #{bidUnit}, #{transactionStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.user_id, p.product_name, p.description, p.image_path, p.category_id, p.auction_start_date, p.auction_end_date, p.starting_price, p.bid_unit, p.transaction_status, ( SELECT MAX(bid_price) FROM bid WHERE product_id = p.product_id ) AS highest_bid FROM product p

SELECT p.product_id, p.user_id, p.product_name, p.description, p.image_path, p.category_id, p.auction_start_date, p.auction_end_date, p.starting_price, p.bid_unit, p.transaction_status, ( SELECT MAX(bid_price) FROM bid WHERE product_id = p.product_id ) AS highest_bid FROM product p WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
